Documentation¶

class reamber.osu.OsuMapObjMeta.OsuMapObjMeta(backgroundFileName: str = '', samples: reamber.osu.lists.OsuSampleList.OsuSampleList = <factory>, hpDrainRate: float = 5.0, circleSize: float = 4.0, overallDifficulty: float = 5.0, approachRate: float = 5.0, sliderMultiplier: float = 1.4, sliderTickRate: int = 1, title: str = '', titleUnicode: str = '', artist: str = '', artistUnicode: str = '', creator: str = '', version: str = '', source: str = '', tags: List[str] = '', beatmapID: int = 0, beatmapSetID: int = -1, distanceSpacing: float = 4, beatDivisor: int = 4, gridSize: int = 8, timelineZoom: float = 0.3, audioFileName: str = '', audioLeadIn: int = 0, previewTime: int = -1, countdown: bool = False, sampleSet: int = 0, stackLeniency: float = 0.7, mode: int = 3, letterboxInBreaks: bool = False, specialStyle: bool = False, widescreenStoryboard: bool = True)¶

The umbrella class that holds everything not included in HitObjects and TimingPoints

class reamber.osu.OsuMapObjMeta.OsuMapObjMode¶

This determines the mode of the map.

Note that only MANIA is supported for now.
